text.p: These are the leading stories in the Algerian press on Saturday as reported by the official Algerian news agency APS. Reuters has not verified these stories and does not vouch for accuracy.
- The national conference opens on Saturday: a great day in Algeria's political history.
- National conference starts to establish democracy through dialogue.
- Soccer team Jeunesse Sportive de Kabylie celebrates 50th anniversary.
- Berber language activists meet in northeastern town of Bejaia to set up a democratic front.
- The national conference convenes to say "five years of crisis are enough!".
